title.narrative: Programa de Justicia Transicional

description.narrative: El programa da respuesta a los desafíos que surgen de los Acuerdos de La Habana y que implican preparar a la institucionalidad y a la sociedad para la superación de las causas del conflicto y cuyo objetivo es resarcir los daños causados a las víctimas.

Project Tenders
Activity Web Page

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

title.narrative: Integrated Results and Resources Framework (IRRF)

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to

title.narrative: Output Indicator 3.2.2.1.C

description.narrative: Country has national and local systems restored or adopted following crises: (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Community-oriented security services and oversight mechanisms

title.narrative: Output Indicator 3.2.2.1.B

description.narrative: Country has national and local systems restored or adopted following crises: (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Victim redress mechanisms including transitional justice

title.narrative: Output Indicator 3.2.1.3.1

description.narrative: Country is supported by UNDP, upon request, to establish or strengthen national infrastructures for peace

title.narrative: Output Indicator 3.2.2.1.D

description.narrative: Country has national and local systems restored or adopted following crises: (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Across a) – c) utilizing joint UN approaches to rebuilding rule of law and justice sector institutions and services

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.3.3.1

description.narrative: Country has strengthened capacities for governance and oversight of rule of law institutions

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.3.1.B

description.narrative: Country has strengthened institutions and systems supporting fulfilment of nationally and internationally ratified human rights obligations Human rights

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.3.1.A

description.narrative: Country has strengthened institutions and systems supporting fulfilment of nationally and internationally ratified human rights obligations Rule of law and justice

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.1.1.A

description.narrative: Country is using frameworks that leverage digital technologies and big data for: Delivery and monitoring of services

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.1.1.D

description.narrative: Country is using frameworks that leverage digital technologies and big data for: Legal identity and civil registration
